REFTOP_PWD.name: REFTOP_PWD
REFTOP_PWD.description: Control bit to power-down the analog bandgap reference circuitry

REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF.name: REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF
REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF.description: Control bit to disable the self-bias circuit in the analog bandgap

enumeratedValues.name: REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF_0
enumeratedValues.description: Uses coarse bias currents for startup

enumeratedValues.name: REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF_1
enumeratedValues.description: Uses bandgap-based bias currents for best performance.

REFTOP_VBGUP.name: REFTOP_VBGUP
REFTOP_VBGUP.description: Status bit that signals the analog bandgap voltage is up and stable

STOP_MODE_CONFIG.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG
STOP_MODE_CONFIG.description: Configure the analog behavior in stop mode. Not related to oscillator.

enumeratedValues.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG_0
enumeratedValues.description: All analog except rtc powered down on stop mode assertion. XtalOsc=on, RCOsc=off;

enumeratedValues.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG_1
enumeratedValues.description: Certain analog functions such as certain regulators left up. XtalOsc=on, RCOsc=off;

enumeratedValues.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG_2
enumeratedValues.description: XtalOsc=off, RCOsc=on, Old BG=on, New BG=off.

enumeratedValues.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG_3
enumeratedValues.description: XtalOsc=off, RCOsc=on, Old BG=off, New BG=on.

DISCON_HIGH_SNVS.name: DISCON_HIGH_SNVS
DISCON_HIGH_SNVS.description: This bit controls a switch from VDD_HIGH_IN to VDD_SNVS_IN.

OSC_I.name: OSC_I
OSC_I.description: This field determines the bias current in the 24MHz oscillator

OSC_XTALOK.name: OSC_XTALOK
OSC_XTALOK.description: Status bit that signals that the output of the 24-MHz crystal oscillator is stable

OSC_XTALOK_EN.name: OSC_XTALOK_EN
OSC_XTALOK_EN.description: This bit enables the detector that signals when the 24MHz crystal oscillator is stable.

CLKGATE_CTRL.name: CLKGATE_CTRL
CLKGATE_CTRL.description: This bit allows disabling the clock gate (always ungated) for the xtal 24MHz clock that clocks the digital logic in the analog block

enumeratedValues.name: ALLOW_AUTO_GATE
enumeratedValues.description: Allow the logic to automatically gate the clock when the XTAL is powered down.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_AUTO_GATE
enumeratedValues.description: Prevent the logic from ever gating off the clock.

CLKGATE_DELAY.name: CLKGATE_DELAY
CLKGATE_DELAY.description: This field specifies the delay between powering up the XTAL 24MHz clock and releasing the clock to the digital logic inside the analog block

RTC_XTAL_SOURCE.name: RTC_XTAL_SOURCE
RTC_XTAL_SOURCE.description: This field indicates which chip source is being used for the rtc clock.

XTAL_24M_PWD.name: XTAL_24M_PWD
XTAL_24M_PWD.description: This field powers down the 24M crystal oscillator if set true.

VID_PLL_PREDIV.name: VID_PLL_PREDIV
VID_PLL_PREDIV.description: Predivider for the source clock of the PLL's. Not related to oscillator.

REFTOP_PWD.description: Control bit to power-down the analog bandgap reference circuitry

OSC_SEL.name: OSC_SEL

CPU_PWRGATE.name: CPU_PWRGATE

DISPLAY_PWRGATE.name: DISPLAY_PWRGATE
DISPLAY_PWRGATE.description: Display logic power gate control. Used as software override. Not related to oscillator.

XTALOSC_PWRUP_DELAY.name: XTALOSC_PWRUP_DELAY
XTALOSC_PWRUP_DELAY.description: Specifies the time delay between when the 24MHz xtal is powered up until it is stable and ready to use

MIX_PWRGATE.name: MIX_PWRGATE
MIX_PWRGATE.description: Display power gate control. Used as software mask. Set to zero to force ungated.

GPU_PWRGATE.name: GPU_PWRGATE
GPU_PWRGATE.description: GPU power gate control. Used as software mask. Set to zero to force ungated.

START.name: START
START.description: Start/stop bit for the RC tuning calculation logic. If stopped the tuning logic is reset.

ENABLE.name: ENABLE
ENABLE.description: Enables the tuning logic to calculate new RC tuning values

BYPASS.name: BYPASS
BYPASS.description: Bypasses any calculated RC tuning value and uses the programmed register value.

INVERT.name: INVERT
INVERT.description: Invert the stepping of the calculated RC tuning value.

RC_OSC_PROG_CUR.name: RC_OSC_PROG_CUR
RC_OSC_PROG_CUR.description: The current tuning value in use.

BYPASS.name: BYPASS

INVERT.name: INVERT
INVERT.description: Invert the stepping of the calculated RC tuning value.

RC_OSC_PROG_CUR.description: The current tuning value in use.

COUNT_1M_TRG.name: COUNT_1M_TRG
COUNT_1M_TRG.description: The target count used to tune the 1MHz clock frequency

ENABLE_1M.name: ENABLE_1M
ENABLE_1M.description: Enable the 1MHz clock output. 0 - disabled; 1 - enabled.

MUX_1M.name: MUX_1M
MUX_1M.description: Mux the corrected or uncorrected 1MHz clock to the output

CLK_1M_ERR_FL.name: CLK_1M_ERR_FL
CLK_1M_ERR_FL.description: Flag indicates that the count_1m count wasn't reached within 1 32kHz period
